sen2r: Find, Download and Process Sentinel-2 Data 1.1.0
  • Home
  • Function reference

Get metadata from raster paths

Source: R/raster_metadata.R
raster_metadata.Rd

This accessory function extract some useful metadata from a vector of raster paths.

raster_metadata(raster_paths, meta = "all", format = "data.table")

Arguments

raster_paths

A vector of raster paths.
meta

Vector with the desired metadata: one or more values among 'res', 'size', 'bbox', 'proj', 'unit', 'outformat', 'type'. Alternatively meta = 'all' (default) allows to return all metadata.
format

One between data.table (default), data.frame and list.

Value

A data.table, data.frame or list of the output metadata.

Note

License: GPL 3.0

Examples

# Define product names
examplenames <- c(
  system.file("tif/L7_ETMs.tif", package="stars"),
  system.file("nc/bcsd_obs_1999.nc", package = "stars"),
  system.file("data/out/S2A2A_20170703_022_Barbellino_BOA_10.tif",
    package = "sen2r")
)

# Return metadata as data.table
raster_metadata(examplenames)
#>                                                                                                        path
#> 1:                                 /home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/tif/L7_ETMs.tif
#> 2:                             /home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/nc/bcsd_obs_1999.nc
#> 3: /home/lranghetti/share/git/github/ranghetti/sen2r/inst/data/out/S2A2A_20170703_022_Barbellino_BOA_10.tif
#>    valid  res.x  res.y size.x size.y nbands     xmin    ymin       xmax
#> 1:  TRUE 28.500 28.500    349    352      6 288776.3 9110729 298722.750
#> 2:  TRUE  0.125  0.125     81     33     12    -85.0      33    -74.875
#> 3:  TRUE 10.000 10.000     24     42     11 580560.0 5101700 580800.000
#>           ymax
#> 1: 9120760.750
#> 2:      37.125
#> 3: 5102120.000
#>                                                                               proj
#> 1: +proj=utm +zone=25 +south +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0,0,0,0,0 +units=m +no_defs
#> 2:                                                                            <NA>
#> 3:                               +proj=utm +zone=32 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs
#>     unit outformat   type
#> 1: Meter     GTiff   Byte
#> 2:  <NA>    netCDF   <NA>
#> 3: Meter     GTiff UInt16

# Return metadata as list
raster_metadata(examplenames, format = "list")
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]]$path
#> [1] "/home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/tif/L7_ETMs.tif"
#> 
#> [[1]]$valid
#> [1] TRUE
#> 
#> [[1]]$res
#>    x    y 
#> 28.5 28.5 
#> 
#> [[1]]$size
#>   x   y 
#> 349 352 
#> 
#> [[1]]$nbands
#> [1] 6
#> 
#> [[1]]$bbox

#>  288776.3 9110728.8  298722.8 9120760.8 
#> 
#> [[1]]$proj
#> Coordinate Reference System:
#>   No EPSG code
#>   proj4string: "+proj=utm +zone=25 +south +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0,0,0,0,0 +units=m +no_defs"

#>     x     y 
#> 0.125 0.125

#>  x  y 
#> 81 33 
#>

#> [1] 11

#> [[3]]$bbox

# Return only two metadata
raster_metadata(examplenames, c("res", "unit"))
#>                                                                                                        path
#> 1:                                 /home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/tif/L7_ETMs.tif
#> 2:                             /home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/nc/bcsd_obs_1999.nc
#> 3: /home/lranghetti/share/git/github/ranghetti/sen2r/inst/data/out/S2A2A_20170703_022_Barbellino_BOA_10.tif
#>    valid  res.x  res.y  unit
#> 1:  TRUE 28.500 28.500 Meter
#> 2:  TRUE  0.125  0.125  <NA>
#> 3:  TRUE 10.000 10.000 Meter

# Output with an invalid raster
examplenames <- c(examplenames, system.file("share/gdal_formats.json", package="sen2r"))
raster_metadata(examplenames)
#> trying to read file: /home/lranghetti/share/git/github/ranghetti/sen2r/inst/share/gdal_formats.json
#>                                                                                                        path
#> 1:                                 /home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/tif/L7_ETMs.tif
#> 2:                             /home/lranghetti/R/x86_64-pc-linux-gnu-library/3.6/stars/nc/bcsd_obs_1999.nc
#> 3: /home/lranghetti/share/git/github/ranghetti/sen2r/inst/data/out/S2A2A_20170703_022_Barbellino_BOA_10.tif
#> 4:                           /home/lranghetti/share/git/github/ranghetti/sen2r/inst/share/gdal_formats.json
#>    valid  res.x  res.y size.x size.y nbands     xmin    ymin       xmax
#> 1:  TRUE 28.500 28.500    349    352      6 288776.3 9110729 298722.750
#> 2:  TRUE  0.125  0.125     81     33     12    -85.0      33    -74.875
#> 3:  TRUE 10.000 10.000     24     42     11 580560.0 5101700 580800.000
#> 4: FALSE     NA     NA     NA     NA     NA       NA      NA         NA
#>           ymax
#> 1: 9120760.750
#> 2:      37.125
#> 3: 5102120.000
#> 4:          NA
#>                                                                               proj
#> 1: +proj=utm +zone=25 +south +ellps=GRS80 +towgs84=0,0,0,0,0,0,0 +units=m +no_defs
#> 2:                                                                            <NA>
#> 3:                               +proj=utm +zone=32 +datum=WGS84 +units=m +no_defs
#> 4:                                                                            <NA>
#>     unit outformat   type
#> 1: Meter     GTiff   Byte
#> 2:  <NA>    netCDF   <NA>
#> 3: Meter     GTiff UInt16
#> 4:  <NA>      <NA>   <NA>
